45.eng-name: Lost Things Picked up by Someone (Luqatah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The Prophet (ﷺ) passed a date fallen on the way and said, "Were I not afraid that it may be from a Sadaqa (charitable gifts), I would have eaten it

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا وَجَدَ تَمْرَةً فِي الطَّرِيقِ
chapter.eng-name: If somebody finds a date on the way
